body: This WOULD'VE been good were it not for the fat fuck. Like, I don't expect them to be all virgins, but even a harem is worthless if it consists of an ugly bastard's second hand goods, especially if he's still actively in the picture. Too bad because everything else was awesome. Harem, ahegao, girls being fucked into submission... but nope. IMO, harem is mostly good when it's special, not when everyone in that world has one, or worse, when the girls don't even belong to MC's harem and are coincidentally fucking him while they're getting clapped anywhere else. Man, I swear my neck and my beard grew a whole 30 cm's, but I just can't. Porn is the one place where I want my wants pandered xD
FINALLY THIS IS GETTING TRANSLATED AHHHH
Look up #403103, then you'll know this is trash
